'''Victory at Hand''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Genius Invokation TCG (Achievement)|Genius Invokation TCG]]''. The achievements are earned by playing [[Action Card]]s in victorious games of [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Trivia==
* The French name of this Achievement may be a reference to the French translation of the song ''{{w|He's Got the Whole World in His Hands}}''.
